|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Model S30853-S1006-R107-4, T7/T8 "3028-001490 28-000270" is silkscreened on the board. The device is similar to the [[Belkin F5D7230-4 v2]]. ==Links of Interest== [http://wiki.openwrt.org/doku.php?id=oldwiki:openwrtdocs:hardware:siemens:se505 On the OpenWrt wiki] [http://forum.freifunk-hannover.de/viewtopic.php?f=10&t=344 Label shot], [http://www.hv-h.de/sonstiges/Freifunk-Hannover/SE505_Platine_Ansicht_Serie4.jpg Internal shot]
[http://bern.openwireless.ch/SE505 More images] (low res) [http://www.dd-wrt.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=26479 On the DD-WRT forums] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = v23 SP3 micro - sf - build 8171 same H/W as Belkin f5d7230 v2000, serial flash device, wan not working First flash use [[TechInfoDepot:DD-WRT/TFTP flash|TFTP flash]] Please insert instructions here [[Category:English Documentation]]
